body:
The instructions here are confusing, I think.
What if we did this to avoid the need for users to edit the cmakefile:

In Cmakefiles.txt, add a new option name can be something like "tensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS", default value to this can be empty.
Then we append this to to the MSVC compilation commands if the build is running on windows.

With the above change, our instructions become this: Just set `-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX`

What do you think?
